snippet: The jet, owned by Norwegian Air Shuttle, has been grounded for two weeks because of software malfunctions involving the brake warning lights and a faulty hydraulic pump.
abstract: Boeing reports that repairs are almost completed on new 787 Dreamliner operated by Norwegian Air Shuttle, latest airline to complain about annoying malfunctions.
lead_paragraph: The jet, owned by Norwegian Air Shuttle, has been grounded for two weeks because of software malfunctions involving the brake warning lights and a faulty hydraulic pump.

headline.main: Boeing 787, Grounded in Norway, Nearly Fixed
headline.print_headline: Boeing 787, Grounded In Norway, Nearly Fixed
